vlive.korean: 카메라 욕심 있어! They are greedy for the camera! 듣기 View video AB6IX : 영민이의 '몰래라이브 #1'

vlive.korean: 더 잘해야 한다는 욕심에... so I want to do really well... 듣기 View video 이한결, 남도현 : [비하인드] 이한결, 남도현 1st Fanmeeting : HAPPY DAY

vlive.korean: [방송 욕심] 그럼 너무 재미없지 않아? [For the show] Where's the fun in that? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.3 돈't Lie #1 (Don't Lie #1)

examples.korean: You greedy pig! You’ve already had two helpings! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 욕심 많은 돼지 같으니라구! 넌 벌써 두 번이나 덜어 먹었잖아! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You greedy pig! You’ve already had two helpings! Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Her plans were overambitious. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀의 계획은 욕심이 과했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her plans were overambitious. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The shareholders are greedy for profit. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 주주들은 수익에 대한 욕심이 많다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The shareholders are greedy for profit. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The greedy pig’s eaten all the biscuits! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 욕심 많은 돼지가 그 비스킷을 다 먹어 치웠어! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The greedy pig’s eaten all the biscuits! Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We simply attempt to be fearful when others are greedy and to be greedy only when others are fearful. (Warren Buffett) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 다른 사람이 욕심을 낼 때 겁을 내려 하고, 다른 사람이 겁을 낼 때만 욕심을 부리곤 한다. (워런 버핏, 인내명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: We simply attempt to be fearful when others are greedy and to be greedy only when others are fearful. (Warren Buffett) Add to Wordbook
